Articles.Content:
Option to see stress points on your ship, for example, red would be heavy stress, yellow would be moderate, green or no color would be no stress detected.

Option to pick various mouse pointers.

Option to show m/s as kph or mph.

M/S is the standard unit of measurement for Space programs.

Mouse pointers? Just install your own?

Stress - it would be green - red. As far as I know
This has been suggested a few times already!
